## Source: kam193 (7ec2eaaeb4b4bef9c2011136563e49c6a94431d9aa6d258ab9d5914aadb02dab)
Installing the package starts downloading and installing an Infostealer


---

Category: MALICIOUS - The campaign has clearly malicious intent, like infostealers.
Campaign: 2024-12-graphicsx
Reasons (based on the campaign):
 - The package overrides the install command in setup.py to execute malicious code during installation.
 - obfuscation
 - Downloads and executes a remote executable.
 - infostealer
 - exfiltration_browser_data
